content.question: Which of the following ethical considerations was most problematic for this study?

choices.label: The risk to participants was too high.
The participants did not have the right to withdraw.
Informed consent was not given for the preteens to participate in the study.

content.answer: Informed consent was not given for the preteens to participate in the study.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
